title: SolidJS Creator on Confronting Web Framework Complexity
author: Loraine Lawson
description: Ryan Carniato, the creator of SolidJS and SolidStart, says Angular and Vue will be the JavaScript frameworks to watch in 2025.
cntitle: SolidJS 创建者谈 Web 框架复杂性
cndescription: Ryan Carniato，SolidJS 和 SolidStart 的创建者，表示 Angular 和 Vue 将是 2025 年值得关注的 JavaScript 框架。
